entry: ●anathema ≡ImmaculateTermforSolar/ Lunar/ AbyssalExalted
●anima ≡ invisibleaura surroundinglivingthings
● artifact ≡Anobjectimbuedwithmagicandoften forgedof{orichalcum, Jade,Soulsteel, moonsilver,starmetal}
● casteMark ≡markuponbrowofExalt displaying casteit invisibleunlessanima flares
● Celestial ≡Exalted championofanIncarnae:Solar, Lunar,andSidereal
● charm ≡Exaltedmagic
●Exalted ≡ mortal chosen& blessedtheyPowerSource gods
●circle ≡groupofExaltedjoinedbyoaths,pactsand sorcery
●daiklave ≡ iconicExaltedweaponEachunique&often oversized,and forgedfrom{Solar ⇒orichalcum,Terrestrial ⇒ Jade, Abyssal ⇒Soulsteel, Lunar ⇒ moonsilver,Sidereal ⇒starmetal}.MaycallforthEvocations.
●demesne ≡ enchantedplaceisnatural vortexofpowertheyRichin essenceTheyoftenhavemanse
● dynast ≡dragon-bloodedrelativeof Scarlet EmpressThey rulingclassofThe Realm
● Elemental Pole ≡oneofFive anchorsThatborderTheworldandholditTogetherthey ≡ PoleofAirinicyNorth/ PoleofFireinSouth, PoleofWaterinwest, PoleofWoodinEast. PoleofEarthon Blessed Isle
●'Pole of Earth'AKA'Imperial Mountain' ≡axis&central anchorof Creationit pierces heavens
● essence ≡currentofenergy movesThroughallthingsitSourceofmagic&Wonder

●Exigence ≡forceof divinefireand creative inspirationestablishedbytheUnconqueredSunsoThat lesser gods mightHavetheirOwnExalted champions. GodswhoTapTheExigenceDoNotlearnThesecretofmakingExalted,butthrough interactionwiththeSun’smedium,theycanCreateNew kindsOf ChosenfromtheirOwnunique Essence.DependingonThepersonalpowerofTheGod,Creatinga chosemightdestroythemOrthey might manageToCreateSomefewataTime.

● Elemental Dragons ≡Childrenof Gaiaand patronsOfTheTerrestrialExalted.Eachdragon embodiesoneofThefive elements,andisa creatureof immenseSizeand unfathomablepower.TheImmaculateOrder veneratesThe Elemental DragonsasTheapotheosisof spiritualdevelopmentofTheTerrestrialExalted.
● Gaia ≡Theonly TitanToSideWiththe godsoutoflovefor Luna.MotherOfTheFive Elemental Dragons

●GreatContagion ≡A catastrophic plagueofThepastwhich broughtlowthe ShogunateofTheDragon-Blooded. Crossing species boundaries,itkillednineoutofeverytenliving creature:fishandfowl,manand insect, leaving endlessfieldsOfdesolation.Thosewith masteryover Essencewereresistant.

●GreatHouse ≡Oneof elevenGreat HousesledbyoneofThe Scarlet Empress'Many spousesandchildren.InThepastthe Empresshas engineeredthefallofthoseShe deemedtoo powerful,and raisednewonesupinTheirplace.EachHouse overseesaNumberofsatrapies,raising legionsforher armies, managing elementsOfher economy,and ruling portionsofher Blessed Isle.
● Hearthstone ≡A tokenofsolid EssenceThatformsinTheheartofaManse. Grants wieldera supernaturalpower.Rarely, HearthstonesmayBeFoundinThewild, markingaplaceWhereaDemesnehadonce existed.
●Incarna ≡OneofThe greatestof godsandrulesof Heaven.Theyarethe godsOfThegreat celestial bodiesofThesky.Oneof:TheUnconqueredSun, Luna,orTheFive Maidens

●UnconqueredSun ≡The greatestofTheIncarnae,theUnconqueredSunisThegodof virtueandwill,warand enlightenment,theDayandtheNight,and excellence.HeisTheKingof Heavenandthe patronofTheSolarExalted.ItwashewhoLedthe godsin rebellionagainsttheir mastersinTheTimeBefore.AtTheheightofTheFirstAge,he turnedhisfacefrom CreationinangeratTheexcessesofThe Solars.
● Luna ≡AnIncarna,the goddessofThemoon,night,luck,iconoclasm,andchange.A legendaryhuntressand tricksterand patronofThe LunarExalted.

●Five Maidens ≡ Mercury,the MaidenofJourneys; Venus,the MaidenofSerenity;Mars,the Maidenof Battles; Jupiter,the Maidenof Secrets;and Saturn,the MaidenofEndingsaretheFive MaidensOf Destiny.AmongtheIncarnae,theyarethe overseersof fateand destiny,ofwhatwillandmustcomeToPass,andofwhat Heaven desires.They speak rarelyand imparttheir secretsToFew.
●Manse ≡ SorcerousConstructionbuildonaDemesneTo channelsitspower. Mansesareoften templesorfortresses.Theyform Hearthstonesandwork magicaleffects,fromthe frivolousToThe usefulToThe dangerous.
● Scarlet Dynasty ≡The rulingclassofThe Realm, composedofthoseDragon-Bloodedwhoare descendedfromthe Scarlet Empressorhavemarriedintoher lineage.Organizedinto elevenGreat Housesandmany smallerhouses.
● Scarlet Empress ≡UnquestionedautarchofThe RealmAndthemostpowerfulpolitical rulerin Creation. Disappeared5yearsago.DefeatedtheFair FolkAftertheGreatContagionand seizedpower.

●FirstAge ≡TheGoldenagebetweenTheTimeBeforeandtheUsurpation,whenmen wieldedgreatmagic.Itwasanage markedby periodsOf enlightenment,peace,and discovery,butitendedin horror, murder,war,andtheUsurpation.>>>><<AgeofSorrows ≡Thecurrent eraSinceTheUsurpationis markedtheSecondAgeofMan,where mortalsandExaltedwarAmidthe ruinsOfTheFirstAge.The LunarscallthiseraThe FallenAge,whileSavantscallitTheAgeofSorrows.
●Second breath ≡The momentofExaltation

● Shogunate ≡Military dictatorshipsetUpbytheDragon-BloodedaftertheUsurpation.DestroyedbytheGreatContagion.The Shogunatewasmarkedby endemic warfarebetweenDragon-BloodedDaimyosandthe catastrophiclossOfFirstAgeMagic.
● sorcery ≡A codifiedand rigidsystemofchanneling EssenceintoMagic.A givenSpellworksidenticallyforanywiththepowertoCastit
●spirit ≡ Divine beingsOf Essenceandwill. Gods,elementals, demons,and ghostsareall spirits.
●Threshold ≡AllpartsOf CreationthatarebetweenThe Blessed Isleandthewyld.
●Usurpation ≡Also calledtheGreatBetrayal, refersToTheeventinwhichtheDragon-bloodedandtheir allies overthrewtheSolarExalted.Theevent weakenedtheworldandledtoTheGreatContagion

● Wyld ≡The Primordial chaosand entropywhichisHomeToTheFair Folk,andfromwhichthethe Titansraisedup Creation.Itisheldbackbythe elemental poles,but pocketsOfwyld remainin Creation remnantsOfTheGreatContagion.
●A WyldHuntisaGroupofDragon-BloodedwhoBandtogethertoHuntandkilltheAnathema.The WyldHuntHasbeen weakenedbythe impendingwarforThe Realm’s throne.Itwillnotstaythatway.
● Creation: Epic Fantasy; Creation ≡ Flatworld floatingonaSeaof chaoscalledthe Wyld.
● Mortal ≡Someoneof Creation untouchedby Essence.Only mortalscan receivetheSecond BreathAnd becomeExalted.

●God ≡A spiritactingasa divine representativeofaplace,thing,orconcept.Lesser godsrepresentMinorThingssuchasaFieldorwell.The greatestofThe godsaretheIncarnae-TheUnconqueredSun, Luna,andtheFive Maidens,whoRuleoverall gods.

●Ghost ≡A deadSoul pulledoutofThecycleof reincarnationby lingering attachmentsToTheworld,darkmagic,aninauspiciousdeath,or improper burial.Mostsuch shades dwellinThemacabreandforeboding Underworld,butsomefindtheirwaybackupTo Creation,particularlyinShadowlands.
● Elemental ≡A spirit arisingfromthefive elementsOfTheNaturalworld.ElementalsLaborTo cycle EssenceThrough Creation.Theyarephysical beingsThatliveinThesameWorldasmenand beasts.
●Demon ≡A spiritofalien majestyand deadlyguile, demonsarethe swornememiesofTheExalted,despitebeing trappedinServiceTo thembyanAncient oath.They hailfromthe realmof Malfeasand servetheYozis.

●Deathlord ≡Hand- chosen servantsOfTheNeverborn,DeathlordsmayBeThemostpowerful beingsToWalktheworldinthisAge.Theycommand undead legionsand untold horrors.Deathlordsarebehindthe emergenceofThe AbyssalExalted.

●Fair Folk ≡Also calledFaeand Rakasha,Fair FolkarebornofThe chaosBeyondtheworld-Ravenous, beautiful,and immortal.Theytakewhatevertheypleasebyforceor seduction. Raksha seemSimilarToMenandwomen,butcouldneverbe mistakenfor mortals.TheFair Folkhate Creation.
●Exigent ≡A categoryofExalt chosenby lesser godsand empoweredbytheExigence.EachExigentisuniqueinpowersandabilities.

●Liminal ≡LiminalExaltsarepatchwork monstersformedof corpsepartsAndimbuedby passionratherthan chosenbythe gods.Theyareundyingbutmustalwaysbe bondedwiththeir creatororanotherlivingSoul,or inexorably slideinto ruinand undeath.TheyhuntThedeadwho treaduponThelandsOfTheliving.

●Sidereal ≡AnExalt chosenbyoneofTheFive Maidens,Siderealsarethe stewardsOf fateand Heaven'sagentsin Creation.InTheFirstAge,they servedthe Solarsas advisors,buttheyUltimately betrayedthe Solars-anEventcalledtheUsurpation.They murderedthe Solarsand raisedupTheTerrestrialExaltsandtheImmaculateOrderasaSystemofcontrol.The Bronze Faction seeksTo murder returning Solars,whiletheGold Faction supportsTheirreturn.

● Abyssal ≡StrangeNewExaltswho appearedatThesameTimeasThe Scarlet Empress’s disappearance,theAbyssalshave emergedfromthe Underworldas championsofTheDeathlords.TheycomeWiththeoldlawsOfThedead,bringingghost-fireand doom wherevertheywalk. Mysteriousharbingers, warrior- poetsand sacred priests,the AbyssalExaltedhave rockedtheworldby slayingDragon-Blooded,Exigents,andeven LunarExalted,andeachis easilyaMatchinSinglecombatTooneofTheSolarExalted.

●Dragon-blooded ≡The ChosenofTheFive Elemental Dragons,andAlsoKnownasTerrestrialExalted,Dragon-Bloodedare weakerthanThe CelestialExaltedbutmore numerous.Theirpowerdoesnot reincarnate,but passesonthroughtheblood.Theydrawtheirpowerfromthefive elements.TheDragon-Bloodedwere convincedbytheSiderealsTo riseupand murderTheSolarExalted,anEventthatendedtheFirstAge.

● Lunar ≡The Chosenof Luna,the LunarsareShapechangers.TheUsurpation chasedthemtoTheedgeofTheworld,wheretheyNowruletheirOwn tribalDominions, wagingunceasingwaragainsttheFair FolktooneSideandthe RealmtoTheother.The LunarslookuponTheSolarExalted’sreturnwith uncertain hearts—duringtheFirstAge,the Lunarswerethe slaves,seconds,andconsortsToTheSolarExalted.That bondhasbeenbroken,butmanyyetFearaReturnToServitude.

●Solar ≡ThemightiestofTheExalted, ChosenbytheUnconqueredSun,the Solarsare mortalswithgreat potentialand ambition giftedwiththepowertofully realizeTheirOwn excellence.Theyarewithoutpeer.InTheFirstAge,they servedasThe generalsOfTheExalted armies.Throughfire,combat,andpeacemaking,they became rulers.OverTimeTheGreat Curse drovethemMad.The Solarswere overthrownDuringtheUsurpation,butnowtheyhave returnedtoTrytoSave Creationfrom doom.
●DaybreakCaste ≡An AbyssalExaltOfTheDaybreakCasteisa craftsman,necrosurgeon,orforgerof souls. WiseinThe forbiddenloreofThe Underworldandabsolute mastersOfnecromancy
● DuskCaste ≡An AbyssalExaltOfThe DuskCasteisa vicious warrior, elegant duelist,ora battlefield Reaper
● MidnightCaste ≡An AbyssalExaltOfThe MidnightCasteisAn evangelistofThegrave, speakerforThe ancestor cult,oraLordofThedead.
● EclipseCaste ≡A SolarExaltOfThe EclipseCasteisa ranger, diplomat,or bureaucrat. skills{ Athletics, Investigation, Stealth,Larceny,Carousing}
●NightCaste ≡A SolarExaltOfTheNightCasteisAn investigator, spy,or assassin.SKILLS: Athletics, Investigation, Stealth,Larceny,Carousing
● TwilightCaste ≡A SolarExaltOfThe TwilightCasteisa scholar,craftperson,oroccultist.SKILLS: Crafting, Investigation, Lore,Occult
●ZenithCaste ≡A SolarExaltOfTheZenithCasteisa priest, prophet,ororator.SKILLS: Athletics, Lore, Survival,War
● DawnCaste ≡A SolarExaltOfThe DawnCasteisa soldier, warrior,armsmaster,orGeneral.SKILLS:RangedFighting, ArmedFighting,UnarmedFighting,War
● Monk ≡A simpleand humble priest,mostoftenofTheImmaculateOrderor CultofThe Illuminated.They exemplifyself-controlAnd masteryoverthebodyand martialarts.
● Sorceror ≡AstudentofTheGreatWork-a tradition dedicatedtoThestudyof ritualmagic.ThosewhoDoNotcommand EssencemustfindanexternalSourceToPowertheir rituals.
●NoMoonCaste ≡A LunarExaltOfTheNoMoonCasteisaShapeshifter mysticwho reliesonclevernessandwistomtooutwitTheir opponents.Theyarethe greatest sorcerersOfThe LunarExalted
●ChangingMoonCaste ≡A LunarExaltOfTheChangingMoonCasteisaShapeshifterwho reliesonGuile, cunning, charisma,andanimalmagnetism.
●FullMoonCaste ≡A LunarExaltOfTheFullMoonCasteisaShapeshifterwho reliesonrawphysical prowessToanswerThe challengesbeforethem.Theyare warriors, athletes,and survivors
●WoodAspect ≡A TerrestrialExaltOfTheAspectofWoodisas beautifulasanorchidand deadlyasnightshade.Deep affinitywiththelivingworld
●WaterAspect ≡A TerrestrialExaltOfTheAspectofWaterisaMasterof adaptationand Uncharted paths.DeepasTheOceanand relentlessasa flood
●FireAspect ≡A TerrestrialExaltOfTheAspectofFireisaDragon-bloodof passionandenergyincarnatebothonThe battlefieldandatcourt
●EarthAspect ≡A TerrestrialExaltOfTheAspectofEarthIsa bastionof patienceand stability. Highly resilient
●AirAspect ≡A TerrestrialExaltOfTheAspectofAirisaheroofquickthoughtand contemplateion. SubtleasThe breezeandDynamicasTheThunderstorm
●MoonshadowCaste ≡An AbyssalExaltOfTheMoonshadowCasteisaMasterofTheoldlawswhichbindthe Underworld.Theyareemissariesand formalizeaccordsbetweenThelivingandtheDead.
●DayCaste ≡An AbyssalExaltOfTheDayCasteisa spyor assassin
● Warrior ≡A legendaryfighterwithgreatcombat prowessandeven greater honor. Warriorsarecombatpowerhouseswhoattacktheir enemieswithcold-blooded furyand grindingthemtoDust.

●Rogue ≡A masterof stealthand cunning,rogues rarelystayinoneplaceforlong.Theyfollowthe windsOf possibilityand passion,andareattunedtoThe rhythmsOfchanceandrisk.InaWorldof chaosand anarchy,aRogueSeizes opportunitywheretheyfindit.
● Priest ≡OneWhoentreatsThe godsinorderTo bargainforpower,usingthat giftTo healtheir alliesandSmiteThe wicked.
●Diplomat ≡A specialistin forgingorderfrom chaosThrough treatiesand bargains.They maintainGoodrelationsbetweencity-stateand negotiate treatiesToend bloodshedbetweenThe RealmAndits neighbors.

●Consort ≡Part spyandpart diplomat,theconsort's specialtyissoftpower.They whisper secretsinto powerful earsOverhearThe secretsOfpowerful mouths,andtradeknowledgefor influence.A goodconsortmustalsobeableto defend themselvesbecauseTheir favorMustcomeataPrice.
● Soldier ≡The backboneofThe Realm'shardpower. Soldiersarehighly disciplinedandmastersOf teamwork.A good soldierisaMasterof siegecraftand Warcraftandthe tacticaluseof alliesand terrain.

●Yozi ≡Demon princesandlordsOfHell,theYozisarethe enemiesofThe gods,who peeroutat Creationwithlustand hatred.OnceTheywerethemastersOfThe universe,butfelltoThemightofTheExalted.Thoseof themwhoWere slainbythe Solars becameTheNeverborn.TheYozisare imprisonedina blasted kingdomofironandblack marble beneathaColdgreenSun,called Malfeas.

● Neutral:Many mortalsholdonly nominal allegianceToa hierarchy.SomeareautocratswhoRuleinTheirOwnname.Mostarecommon folkswhoCaremoreaboutlivingday-to-daythanany particular allegiance.They observetheRulesofThe RealmoneDay,andifthe Realmis pushedoutbyaShadowlandthenTheyfollowaDeathlordthenextday.

●Neverborn ≡ThroughtheExaltedthe enemiesofThe godsWere slainand becameTheNeverborn, vast ghosts dreaminginThe deepestpartofThe Underworld.Their whispersshapeThe afterlife,andtheirMagicempowersTheDeathlordsandthe AbyssalExalted.TheywerethemastersOfThe universeuntilthe godsraised championsagainstthem.WhethertheyseektoDragtheworldintoDeathsoTheycanruleitoncemore,or obliterateit entirelytoescapeitsfettersandfindaFinalrest,nonecanSay.
●Outcaste ≡Dragon-BloodedwhoDoNotclaim fealtytoThe Realm,eitherby membershipinoneofThe Dynasty’sGreat Houses,serviceasa monkofTheImmaculateOrder,or soldierinThe legionsare labeledoutcastes.

●ImmaculateOrder ≡Thestate religionofThe Realm.TheImmaculateOrder teachesits adherentsThatThecycleof reincarnation leadsinan upward spiraltoonenesswiththeFive Elemental Dragons,from animalsThrough mortalsThroughDragon-Blooded.Italso teachesThat spiritsare celestialfunctionaries,and worshipisa dangerousactivityfitonlyforTheDragon-Blooded.ImmaculateMonksarereknown martial artists.

●The Guild ≡An associationof mortal tradesmenandplutocrats,the Guild spans Creation,moving drugs, slaves,andSundriesAcrossTheworld.OneofThemostpowerfulEconomicforces,the Guildis governedalmost entirelyby mortals.They maintaintheSilverstandardofThe dinarand promoteeconomic stability worldwideevenasTheypush opiumon entire nationsand enslave entire tribes.BasedoutofTheScavenger Lands,theyareatTimes opposedtoThe RealmAndatTimesworkinconcertwithit.
● CultofThe Illuminated ≡ Creation-wide mysterycult devotedto worshipof mysterioussaviorswhoWillreturnTheworldto righteousness.OpposeTheImmaculateOrder.

●The Realm ≡Themightiest empirein Creation,basedonThe Blessed Isleand ruledbythe Scarlet Dynasty,the Realm controlsHundredsOfsatrapiesAcrossTheThreshold, nationsunderDragon-Bloodedboot.The RealmExtorts taxesand tributeFromalmostthe wholeofThe civilizedworld.

●Fortitude ≡ Neutral;Fortitude ≡ Prison fortress-cityNorth;Strongestandmost ruthlessriseToThetop;NoLawbutwhatThestrong decree. Tribesof prisonersToilin darkness, harvesting plantsand gemsforThe gangsThatruntheprison.FortitudeisaplaceWherethe darknessis worshiped,thewinteris hated,andeveryman believesheis cursed.Itspeople believethatonlya heroiclifeand immortalDeathcanatonefora darkenedSoul.

●Grieve ≡ Neutral;Grieve ≡Port-cityNorth;HomeToartisans, merchantsand laborers,andthealchemistswho discoveredtheWhite Elixir.TheWhite Elixir grantsaMacabre immortality, preservingbodyandSoulInTheInstantofdeath.Grieve’s richestcitizenswhoHaveprocuredthe Elixirare recognizablebytheir unusual pallorandthe parasolsTheyemploytoWardofftheSun.Foreigners arriveinincreasingNumbersToPurchase immortality,tradeinThe Elixir’sreagents,or seekwealth.

●Lookshy ≡GreatcityinTheEastthatdatesbacktoThe Shogunate.ItisHomeToThe Seventh Legion,thepre- eminentmilitarypowerinTheScavenger Lands.Thestill possesssomefew craftsmenwhoCan maintainthestoreofFirstAgeWeapons. Visitors cannotenterThe UpperCitywithout authorization.

●Sijan ≡Great tomb-cityonTheedgeofaShadowlandinTheEast.Funaralistshereare familiarwithallritesand ritualsrelatedtoDeath,buttheirultimateServiceisTo ensurethe ghostsOfThe deceased retainwealthandstatus.Great treasuresareentombed inThe necropoli,protectedby trapsand guardians.LiminalExaltedhavean alliancewithSijan.

●Yu- Shan ≡ Heaven.The celestialcityofYu- ShanisHomeToThe godsandtheIncarnaeWho overseeThemanagementof Heaven, Creation,and fateThroughaGrand bureaucracy.OfTheExalted,onlytheSiderealExaltedcallitHome.

● Underworld ≡ThelandsOfThedead, floatingonTheSeaofThevoid,the Underworldisa shattered reflectionof CreationandaCapstoneovertheTombsOfTheNeverborn.ThosewhoDieandare unabletoMoveon become trappedinThe Underworld,wherethe soulsand Essenceofdeadthingshave congregated,givingriseToMaladyand horror.ThisiswheretheDeathlordskeepTheir kingdoms.TheyhavebuiltTheirfortressesinto Creation;inEverydirection,theSpiresofaDeathlord’s Citadel peersout.

●Shadowland ≡Wherethe Underworld touches Creation; PlaceswhereNo barrier existsbetweenlifeanddeath,andthelivingmay treatwiththeDead.ThosewhoLeaveaShadowlandduringtheDayfind themselvesin Creation,whilethosewhoLeaveits bordersatnightenterThe Underworld.

●Scavenger Lands ≡The territoryinTheNearEastofTheThresholdwho proclaimindependencefromthe Realm,having resistedmultiple invasions.ItsheartisTheRiver Province,aRegioncontainingaSeriesof mighty, loosely alliedcity-statesliningthe mighty riversThatrunthroughtheheartofTheRegion.

● Malfeas ≡Hell.A nightmarish kingdomof brassandobsidianundera sickeninggreenSky. Malfeas sitsoutsideTheworld, surroundedbyan endless desertatTheendsOf eternity.TheYoziswere imprisonedherewiththeirDemon legionsafterbeing vanquishedbytheExalted.WhenaDemonis summonedfrom Malfeasbya sorcerer,itmaycrossThe sandsOf eternityinjustfiveDays, departingfiveDaysin advanceofThe sorcerer’sCall.

● Blessed Isle ≡Thegreat island- continentatThecenterof Creation,onceThehomeofThe godsandnowthe homelandofThe Realm.AtThecenterofTheworld,the PoleofEarth piercesThe heavensinTheformofThe Imperial Mountain.The PoleofEarthIsTheaxisof Creation,aroundwhichtheworld moves.Itis dormantand steady, balancingthe elementsOf Creationintoa stable harmony.Asone travelsawayfromthe PoleofEarth,the directionalpole’s influence grows strongeruntilrealityis rippedaway.
●orichalcum ≡ magicalmaterial,superheavygoldattunedSolarExalted
● moonsilver ≡ magicalmaterial,fluidicSilverattuned LunarExalted
● Jade ≡ magicalmaterial,stoneattunedDragon-blooded
●starmetal ≡ magicalmaterial,fromsky,attunedSiderealExalted
●Soulsteel ≡ magicalmaterial,from Underworld,attuned AbyssalExalted

●_synonyms
● Charm:ExcellentStrike ≡Avery accurateattack.{Solar, Abyssal, Lunar,Sidereal,Terrestrial; Melee}
● Charm:FireandStoneStrike ≡Anattackthat channels essenceintoFirethrougha meleeWeapon.{Solar; Melee}
● Charm:Peony BlossomAttack ≡InstantAdditionalattack.{Solar; Melee}
● Charm:DippingSwallowDefense ≡Verypowerfulparry.{Solar; Melee}
● Charm:BulwarkStance ≡ForaSingleTurn,youAttempta parryand reduceThedamageofall incomingattacks.{Solar; Melee}
● Charm:War LionStance ≡YouChooseanotherpersonThenforTheRestofcombatyoucanAttemptto parryanyattacksdirectedatthatperson.{Solar; Melee}
● Charm:Guard-Breaking Technique ≡ExecuteaFeintandthenstrikea powerfulblow.{Solar; Melee}
● Charm:SolarCounterattack ≡Whenparrying,theExaltmaylaunchAn immediatecounterattackbeforeanydamageis sustained.Thiscounterattackdoesnot preventdamagefromthe incomingattack.{Solar; Melee}
● Charm: RisingSun Slash ≡Apowerful leapingattackwhich channelsan inexorableflowof EssenceThroughtheweapon, greatly boostingtheSpeedandferocityofTheattack.{Solar; Melee}
